descripcion: Discover how our AI-based platform revolutionizes technical support for computers by providing instant, effective, and secure solutions for both home users and IT specialists.

items.title: Instant Diagnosis
items.desc: Quickly detect common errors on your computer without needing to wait for human assistance.

items.title: 24/7 Support
items.desc: Constant technical assistance available at all times to resolve any issue with your device.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.desc: An intuitive design that facilitates interaction even for users with limited technical knowledge.

items.title: Information Security
items.desc: Your data and technical queries are protected with high-security encrypted protocols.

items.title: Continuous Improvement
items.desc: The AI learns with each diagnosis, improving accuracy in identifying technical failures.

items.title: Smart Scalability
items.desc: Ability to serve multiple devices and simultaneous queries without losing speed or effectiveness.

guiaTitulo: How to use the BMO.IA assistant
guia: Go to the chat section from the main menu.
Type your query related to your computer: system errors, slowness, apps not opening, etc.
Click Send or press Enter to get a response.
Review the solution provided by the AI and follow the recommended steps.
When you finish your session, you can safely log out using the top right button.
